notes.note:
The second line I messed the names up on purpose since she only really remembers Power Loader and Deku in the show.
I switched it up a bit following the same idea. Lmk your thoughts
Hatsume doesn't realize starfire is actually an alien. She's used to people looking weird because of their quirks. This line is in coincidentally jest on her part.
